channel.title: Running out of ideas
channel.description: Well tell me which one you guys would like more. [hr] Option 1: The video game one, I would go around asking people stuff like "Do you know how to get to fally, I need to finish this quest to wear white armour". or asking if they can show me to the general store [hr] Option 2: I would walk up to people door's with the cards and when they come to the door I would look at them and say "ITS YUGIOH/POKEMON TIME, LETS DO THIS!" [hr] Option 3: I would dress up like a ninja(head bands, all black, tack vest, ETC), and go yell at a tree*SGT Woody*, in my front yard, then walk in my house and come back out swinging swords at it. [hr] Option 4: I would just walk up and be like "Hi (random name here) do you know me?" and hope 2 things, they know me and if I got there name right lol. [hr] So tell me what I should do.

item.title: Running out of ideas
item.dc:creator: @RunesGAYpe RunesGAYpe
item.description:
@RunesGAYpe wrote:

Drive around tampa with a few buds
every time you see someone in a telephone booth open the dorr and kick them as HARD AS YOU CAN then drive away
get a video of it XD

Read full topic

item.title: Running out of ideas
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Well tell me which one you guys would like more.
[hr]
Option 1: The video game one, I would go around asking people stuff like “Do you know how to get to fally, I need to finish this quest to wear white armour”. or asking if they can show me to the general store
[hr]
Option 2: I would walk up to people door’s with the cards and when they come to the door I would look at them and say “ITS YUGIOH/POKEMON TIME, LETS DO THIS!”
[hr]
Option 3: I would dress up like a ninja(head bands, all black, tack vest, ETC), and go yell at a treeSGT Woody, in my front yard, then walk in my house and come back out swinging swords at it.
[hr]
Option 4: I would just walk up and be like “Hi (random name here) do you know me?” and hope 2 things, they know me and if I got there name right lol.
[hr]
So tell me what I should do.
